title: >>> RUMORS Welcome
body_text:
"RUMORS Welcome" is the perfect column to hype up DODGEBALL 20. December 30th, 2005 will be the most celebrated day in dodgeball history, and the rumors below will only add to it ...
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
I.
Due to numerous concerns, KJohn Tronolone has been strongly thinking of dropping the Hall of Fame altogether.
II.
KJohn is trying to get his younger brother Michael to play at DODGEBALL 20.
III.
On December 22nd, Mike "Sputz" Krott severely injured his left knee and will not participate at "The ClimaXX".
IV.
Dan Spengeman will be missing DODGEBALL 20. He will be visiting family out of state.
V.
KJohn has been lying for days saying that he created the DODGEBALL 20 logo, when in fact he did not.
VI.
A big rumor circulating concerns Sara DeCuir; her final event could very well be DODGEBALL 20.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
Can you feel it?
6 days remain.
